sentences.en: Annie: What is the tenet of the Asian Games?
sentences.cn: 安妮: 亚运会的宗旨是什么?

sentences.en: Annie: What is the tenet of the Olympic sports then?
sentences.cn: 安妮: 那么奥林匹克运动的宗旨是什么?

sentences.en: Being fidelity and excellence is our permanent tenet. Cooperate sincerely, development mutually.
sentences.cn: 诚信务实,追求卓越为宗旨,真诚合作, 共谋发展.

sentences.en: Business Tenet: Leading technology, excellent talents, super quality and best service.
sentences.cn: 经营宗旨 -------- 科技先导, 人才先行, 品质至上,服务至善.

sentences.en: I hold to the tenet that theory should be united with practice.
sentences.cn: 我坚持理论和实践必须相结合的原则.

sentences.en: If a given tenet seems to be true -- why?
sentences.cn: ”如果某个信条看似真实的 —— 就问“为什么?

sentences.en: If another tenet seems to be false -- why?
sentences.cn: ”如果另一信条 看似 虚假的就问“为什么?

sentences.en: Non-violence and patience are the central tenets of their faith.
sentences.cn: 非暴力和忍耐是他们信仰的基本原则。

sentences.en: Our tenet is top services, quality products and reasonable prices.
sentences.cn: 我们愿意为各大酒店提供一流的服务.

sentences.en: Our Tenet: Quality is the life, integrity and development.
sentences.cn: 我们的企业宗旨: 质量是生命, 诚信求发展.

sentences.en: Tenet of our company: advanced technology, first - class products and first - class service.
sentences.cn: 本厂宗旨: 一流技术 、 流产品、流服务.

sentences.en: The freedom to paint such an intensely personal experience became a basic tenet of Expressionism.
sentences.cn: 描绘这种强烈地表现个人感受的自由成为表现主义的基本原则.

sentences.en: The mutability of the past is the central tenet of Ingsoc.
sentences.cn: 窜改过去是英社的中心原则.

sentences.en: The only moral tenet governing the conduct of business in the shop was that the goods should be genuine and the price fair.
sentences.cn: 货真价实,是商店唯一的道德.

sentences.en: This is a basic tenet of capitalism.
sentences.cn: 这是资本主义的一则基本信条.

sentences.en: We truly fulfill the tenet: " As within, so without. "
sentences.cn: 我们真实地实现理念, “ 在?面的, 也在外面 ”.

trans.tran_en: a principle or belief, especially one that is part of a larger system of beliefs
